programme.title: STV News
programme.desc: The STV National News covering all of Scotland.

programme.desc: Current affairs show tackling issues behind the headlines from a Scottish perspective

programme.title: The Assembly
programme.desc: Gary Lineker faces a grilling from a collective of autistic and learning-disabled interviewers where no question is off the table and no subject out of bounds.

programme.desc: The first leg of Joanna Lumleys epic adventure along the river Danube takes her from Germanys Black Forest into the wine valleys of Austria and on to Vienna.

programme.title: Tipping Point

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Looking for Lingos this time are best mates Tamika and Ollie from Essex and Hertfordshire, couple Amy and Chris from London, and Riccardo and his mum Christiana from Rochdale.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts as Nikki goes head-to-head with the Banker - tune in to find out if she will take home the jackpot or become the latest member of the 1p Club.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: All that stands between Katherine from Guernsey, Kirin from Nottingham, James from London, Charlene from Portstewart and thousands of pounds is the small matter of a Chaser.

programme.desc: STV News from Glasgow and the West.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: April sees no choice, Celia realises that she has a problem on her hands, and Marlon and Rhona are gobsmacked.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Becky hastens to Costellos bedside to cover her tracks, Will overhears Daniel asking Megan on a date, and Dee-Dee refuses to commit to spending Christmas with Ollie.

programme.title: Im a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here!
programme.desc: Ant and Dec are in Australia with another look at life in the camp - the countdown is now on as the celebrities are into their final days living in the jungle.
